definitions.text: the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture
examples: the culprit started to run and the cop took off in pursuit

definitions.text: United States politician and jurist who served as chief justice of the United States Supreme Court (1808-1873)
a rectangular metal frame used in letterpress printing to hold together the pages or columns of composed type that are printed at one time
go after with the intent to catch
examples: The policeman chased the mugger down the alley

definitions.text: cut a furrow into a columns
